mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN AS resultStextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE AS workCompleteEnable, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE AS workCompleteDate, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001150

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO AS terminalSeqNo, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN AS resultStextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, TERMINAL_PROD_NO AS terminalProdNo, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE AS workCompleteEnable, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE AS workCompleteDate, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001150 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001150 SET TERMINAL_SEQ_NO = #{terminalSeqNo}, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN = #{resultStextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{terminalCorpCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, TERMINAL_PROD_NO = #{terminalProdNo}, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE = #{workCompleteEnable}, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE = #{workCompleteDate}, UNUSL = #{unusl} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001150 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, TERMINAL_SEQ_NO, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, MODEL_CODE, TERMINAL_PROD_NO, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE, UNUSL ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{terminalSeqNo}, #{resultStextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{terminalCorpCode}, #{modelCode}, #{terminalProdNo}, #{workCompleteEnable}, #{workCompleteDate}, #{unusl} )
